Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 16th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 2006...
Injured on 7/26/2006 with a Broken Hip, out for full season...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Seattle on 2/4/2010 (Going to SEA: C J. Montero, 3B M. Dominguez, P T. Scheppers. Going to PIT: P B. Ford, P C. Politte)...
Injured on 5/27/2011 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 6/16/2012, off Brad Ziegler (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/30/2014, off Francisco Liriano (TEX)...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Oakland on 6/21/2020...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 9/19/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/14/2023 to a 4-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
